articles.description: Pine, star of "Wonder Woman" and "Star Trek," told Jimmy Kimmel that he lied to a partygoer and told him he was in fact Chris Evans, who played Captain America in many a Marvel film, after the man mistook him for Joey Lawrence.
articles.content:
(CNN)Many know Chris Pine as the blue-eyed, Captain Kirk-portraying member of the Hollywood Chrises (other members: Evans, Hemsworth, Pratt). 
A partygoer at an Oscars shindig over the weekend knew … [+1262 chars]

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Elliot Page's 'Umbrella Academy' character to come out as transgender - CNN
articles.description: Elliott Page's character on "Umbrella Academy" will mimic real life.

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi's premiere will be two days late, but you'll get two episodes at once - The Verge
articles.description: The Obi-Wan Kenobi Disney Plus series will now debut on Friday, May 27th, two days later than previously announced. There will be two episodes of the Star Wars spinoff available to watch on the premiere date instead of just one.
articles.content:
The show now debuts on May 27th
